IX.iii.1.G.3.a
.
Definition:  Nursing Home
For the purposes of the medical expense deduction, a
nursing home
means
any extended care facility which is licensed by a State to provide skilled or intermediate-level nursing care, or
a nursing home care unit in a State Veterans' home which is approved for payment under
38 U.S.C. 1742
.
Reference
:  For more information on nursing homes, see
38 CFR 3.1(z)(1) and (2)
, and
38 CFR 3.278(b)(5)
.
